select us.id user_id,us.name user_name
,us.icon_url url,us.token
,us.enterprise_url url,us.token
from app_task t left join app_task_user tu on t.id=tu.order_id
inner join app_user_info us on tu.user_id=us.id
inner join app_enterprises_info us on tu.user_id=us.id
where t.id=#{task_id} and (tu.[type]!=2 or tu.[type] is null)
and tu.status=#{status}
select t.* from app_task_user t where 1=1 and t.order_id=#{task_id} and t.user_id=#{user_id} and (t.[type]!=2 or t.[type] is null) order by t.create_time desc

mapper.select: select top (convert(int,#{rows})) temp.* from ( select row_number() over (order by q.create_time desc) as RowNumber,q.* from app_question q inner join ( select c.question_id from app_courses_question c group by c.question_id )cq on q.id=cq.question_id where 1=1 ) as temp where RowNumber > convert(int,#{rows})*(convert(int,#{page})-1) order by temp.create_time desc

select top (convert(int,#{rows})) temp.* from ( select row_number() over (order by q.create_time desc) as RowNumber,q.* from app_question q inner join ( select f.question_id from app_forum_question f group by f.question_id )fq on q.id=fq.question_id where 1=1 ) as temp where RowNumber > convert(int,#{rows})*(convert(int,#{page})-1) order by temp.create_time desc
